name: Infinite Curse
description:
Infinite Curse is a retro Roguelike, exploratory adventure surrounded by items and dark creatures. Navigate through the levels as Taylor, a thief that dared to take precious treasures from Vlad and was cursed with an eternal life on the lam within the limits of his mansion and now, Taylor must survive seeking for items while fighting battles with different enemies to reach the end of the tunnel. But does it really exists?

*Disclaimer: the game is in development and It's recommended to play it on Android.

Score points by freely exploring the dungeons, in which power-up itens and enemies can be found. The more levels reached and enemies defeated, higher will be the score point! Try to survive to tell the tale. 

- Mouse click to walk around and interact with objects.
